hasAttributes.name: absenceValuation
hasAttributes.description: An absence can be paid 100% or can be partially paid or unpaid.

hasAttributes.name: assignPayScaleCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the entity, e.g. EUR for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: attendanceAndAbsenceTexts
hasAttributes.description: Description/explanation given for attendance and absence types.

hasAttributes.name: attendanceAndAbsenceTypes
hasAttributes.description: Category of each type of attendance available to employees, e.g. Sick, Vacation, or Personal.

hasAttributes.name: benefitInsurancePlan
hasAttributes.description: Employee can choose between single or family medical care coverage, life, short-term leave, long-term leave, travel, etc.

hasAttributes.name: benefitsInsuranceCoverageRule
hasAttributes.description: Whether all employees are covered (permanent and temporary), age grouping details, etc.

hasAttributes.name: businessArea
hasAttributes.description: An organizational unit that can be classified geographically or product-wise as per the requirements of an organization.

hasAttributes.name: dailyWorkSchedule
hasAttributes.description: Specifies the number of working hours with clock in and clock out on a particular day.

hasAttributes.name: dailyWorkScheduleTexts
hasAttributes.description: Description/explanation given for the particular dailyWorkSchedule.

hasAttributes.name: departmentCode
hasAttributes.description: Code for department rosters, e.g. the department name is IT department, the code is 0018.

hasAttributes.name: employeeDateOfBirth
hasAttributes.description: The date of birth of the employee.

hasAttributes.name: employeeFirstName
hasAttributes.description: The first (given) name of the employee.

hasAttributes.name: employeeGroupSubgroup
hasAttributes.description: Used to distinguish between active employed, contractor, pensioner, Resigned, Early retirees etc.

hasAttributes.name: employeeId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for an employee. Typically auto-generated by the system.

hasAttributes.name: employeeJobTitle
hasAttributes.description: Job title of a person in a business unit, e.g. Accounting manager, Finance Controller, Operations manager.

hasAttributes.name: employeeLastName
hasAttributes.description: The last (family) name of the employee.

hasAttributes.name: employeeMiddleName
hasAttributes.description: The middle (family) name of the employee.

hasAttributes.name: employeeRefCode
hasAttributes.description: Code for employee. Each employee has only one code. If someone has part-time jobs in multiple departments, there will be more than one record with different employeeId in this table. The part-time status will be reflected in employmentTypeCode.

hasAttributes.name: employeeSubgroupNames
hasAttributes.description: Allows further distinguish of employee group into subgroup, e.g. Active Employees subdivided into Salaried Employee, Hourly Paid, Trainee, Volunteer, etc.

hasAttributes.name: employmentStartDate
hasAttributes.description: Employment start date of the employee.

hasAttributes.name: employmentStatus
hasAttributes.description: Employees being Active, Inactive, Retiree, Withdrawn, etc.

hasAttributes.name: employmentTerminationDate
hasAttributes.description: Employment termination date of the employee from when the labour contract was no longer valid, or from when the employee no longer works in this department.

hasAttributes.name: employmentTypeCode
hasAttributes.description: Code for the employee type, e.g. 004 is an on-the-job employee, 005 is a retired employee and 006 is a deceased employee.

hasAttributes.name: employmentTypeName
hasAttributes.description: Name of the employee type, e.g. employed, retired, probation, part time.

hasAttributes.name: isActiveFlag
hasAttributes.description: Indicates whether one employee is active or inactive. An employee can become inactive due to various reasons, e.g. sabbatical leave.

hasAttributes.name: monthlyWorkSchedule
hasAttributes.description: Specifies the number of working days and holidays in a particular month.

hasAttributes.name: organizationalUnits
hasAttributes.description: Functional units in an enterprise, e.g. departments, division, groups, project teams, etc.

hasAttributes.name: payScaleGroups
hasAttributes.description: Compensation structure as per grouping, payroll processing procedure, and the value of compensation for an employee.

hasAttributes.name: payScalePeriodParameterAssignment
hasAttributes.description: Determines whether payroll is run monthly, quarterly, weekly or for several weeks.

hasAttributes.name: payScaleTypes
hasAttributes.description: Net Salary, Gross Salary, CTC, etc.

hasAttributes.name: payrollAccountingAreas
hasAttributes.description: Recording of its employees' compensation into gross wages, salaries, bonuses, commissions, withholding of payroll taxes.

hasAttributes.name: payrollPeriods
hasAttributes.description: Should identify payroll periods, e.g. monthly, bi-weekly or weekly.

hasAttributes.name: personnelCountryGrouping
hasAttributes.description: Provision variant used for grouping the wage types as per the statutory regulations of the country and also for travel management.

hasAttributes.name: specialPaymentStatus
hasAttributes.description: Special payments are usually non-recurring payments that the employee receives in addition to their wage or salary, e.g. a holiday bonus.

hasAttributes.name: supervisorArea
hasAttributes.description: Gives the position level and the superior info based on the work flow.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userId
hasAttributes.description: A unique identifier of individuals entering transactions into the ERP system. This field is used to join information in this table to other tables based on the fields EnteredBy, LastModifiedBy, and ApprovedBy.

hasAttributes.name: wageTypeTexts
hasAttributes.description: Description given for the particular wage type.

hasAttributes.name: wageTypeValuation
hasAttributes.description: Valuation based on hourly rate, basic pay or from previous payroll periods.

hasAttributes.name: wageTypes
hasAttributes.description: Evaluated with a monetary amount that should be paid out to the employee or that they should withhold, e.g. salary, allowances, bonus, etc.

hasAttributes.name: workScheduleRules
hasAttributes.description: Company's time table and contains information on working and break time for groups of employees.
